scripts.fmt: cd cpp_modules/fmt && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=../dist .. && make install
scripts.build: cd test && pwd && mkdir -p build/src && make -j 3 -f Makefile all
scripts.test: cnpm build && cd test && pwd && ./test --test-case='test reading mimes db.json'
